title: Easy classic Victoria sponge cake
ingredients: ['a little butter for greasing', 'a little flour for dusting', '225g unsalted softened butter', '225g caster sugar', '5 to 6 eggs', '225g self raising flour, sifted', 'zest of one lemon', '150g strawberry jam', '250g fresh strawberries, tops cut off and sliced', '285ml double cream', '3 tablespoons caster sugar', 'juice from 1 lemon', 'icing sugar']
